详情: LIGHTER THAN FLEECE - Frech terry is our lightweight material that feels great on the skin and keeps you warm without the bulk.
THE FIT - Regular women's sweatpant fit with a 31" inseam.
COMFORT FIRST - Adjustable drawstrings for a just-right fit.
TAGLESS - Hanes no-tag approach ensure a no-fuss, no-itch feel.
EASY CARE - Machine wash cold with like colors. Non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry medium.
